title: EMEM Apparel Men’s Mild Compression Over the Calf Socks 12-15 mmHg 2-Pack, Big and Tall Available
features: MATERIAL: Careful combination of 97% Nylon and 3% Lycra Spandex make these socks greatly supportive and comfortable. These socks are cotton free to reduce moisture absorption & irritation.

CLASSIC STYLE: These compression socks are over the calf length & finely ribbed for a good look. With a variety of colors to choose from this will go to every pant you want to match. Now you could get the support you need & the look you like!

SUPREME COMFORT: Gentle graduated compression socks are good for improving blood flow and reducing fluid retention while providing comfortable support. This will reduce swelling, rejuvenate tired & achy legs & even help for varicose veins, edema & post-surgical procedures.
GREAT QUALITY: Carefully designed for long lasting superior quality, won ‘t fade or misshape wash after wash.

EVERY OCCASION: Great socks to wear on lengthy airplane trips, long periods of standing or even for every day wear. Is it at work, while exercising, walking or doing tasks at home. This will greatly work to relief your feet.
EASY WASH: These easy care socks are machine washable and dryable for hassle free laundering.
description: EMEM Apparel Men’s Mild Compression Over the Calf Socks 12-15 mmHg
Each pack includes 2 pairs of high quality compression socks.
Careful combination of 95% Nylon and 5% Lycra Spandex make these socks greatly supportive and comfortable. These socks are cotton free to reduce moisture absorption & irritation

Classy ribbed over the calf socks are uniquely constructed to decrease in pressure as it moves from ankle to calf. The variety of fashionable colors makes this possible for every day wear without compromising on look.

Wear these socks anytime & every time. wear on lengthy airplane trips, long periods of standing or even for every day wear. Is it at work, while exercising, walking or doing tasks at home. This will greatly work to relief your feet. This will work best when dressed in the morning to offer relief all day long.
- Cotton free to reduce moisture absorption & irritation
- Helps for Varicose Veins, Edema & post-surgery procedures
Laundering is easy & carefree. Machine wash in cold water, & tumble dry low. That simple!
